backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point for the ICP canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each UI feature (hero, about, collections, why-choose, etc.) to their implementing source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, gold, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Namo Jewellers React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering Navigation, HeroSection, AboutSection, CollectionsSection, WhyChooseSection, TestimonialsSection, ContactSection, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About Us section component displaying Namo Jewellers' brand story, a generated illustration image, and a stats grid with rating, customer count, quality, and design metrics.
frontend/src/components/CollectionsSecti: Collections section displaying five jewellery category cards (Bridal, Necklaces, Earrings, Bangles & Bracelets, Daily Wear) with emoji icons, descriptions, and generated category images.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with a full-width generated banner image background, store hours, and CTA buttons for calling and getting directions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand identity, quick navigation links, collection links, and contact/hours info arranged in a four-column grid.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the full-screen hero section for Namo Jewellers with a background image, brand name, tagline, rating badge, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll nav links, a call CTA, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays a customer testimonials section with an overall 4.7-star rating summary and three individual review cards.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseSection: Renders a 'Why Choose Us' section listing six value propositions as icon-and-text cards, plus a closing brand quote.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Jost), sets up Tailwind directives, and defines a warm gold luxury design system with CSS custom properties for light/dark modes plus utility classes for brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with brand fonts, oklch-based color tokens (gold, champagne, ivory, charcoal), custom shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (v3) describing a single-page premium website for Namo Jewellers with sections for hero, about, collections, testimonials, and contact, along with required image specs and existing feature definitions.
